v1.0.0 Release

Whats New

We remade the whole project and app with a new design and features including the following: - Ad Blocker - Bookmarks Support - Search History - Custom Search Engine (choosing from Google Bing Yahoo etc etc...) - Option to reset or delete browser history in a certain days/weeks - Upgraded Sparkle Package - New UI - Better searching Logic and core - browser like logic(to prevent Google Flagging the browser with Googles Captchas - and many more

Note That

Version 1.0.0 is not considered alpha or beta anymore but note that there might still be bugs and issues please make issues in GitHub repo for us to know what to fix.
